idea-plugin.description: Pomodoro Boost is a customizable Pomodoro timer designed specifically for IntelliJ IDEA. Whether you're coding, studying, or writing, Pomodoro Boost helps you stay focused and productive. Inspired by the Pomodoro Technique developed by Francesco Cirillo, this plugin breaks your work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks. With Pomodoro Boost, you can optimize your work sessions directly within your IntelliJ environment, enhancing your efficiency and maintaining your focus.
